Admin Panel - Take Full Control

Laravel Admin panel for Flutter home service app is the heart of the solution. It gives full access and control of the platform to admin.

Buy Now
View Plan
★★★★★ 5/5
#1 Handyman App

Overview

Unlock Business Potential with Admin Panel

Here's a quick overview video of Laravel Admin Panel and its features.

Dashboard

Analytical Dashboard

Admin Dashboard offers a wide area of customization for the developers and admin.

VIEW DEMO

Categories

Manage Categories

Admin can easily add, modify or delete any category or subcategory for entire platform.

VIEW DEMO

Services

Service List

Admin can view all the services listed on the platform and can add new services when needed.

VIEW DEMO

providers list

Manage Providers

Admin can view all the providers registered on the platform, check their documents and status.

VIEW DEMO

Bookings

Booking List

Admin can access all the Bookings done on the platform with its complete details and status.

VIEW DEMO

Handyman

Handyman List

Admin can view all the Handyman registered on the platform, and check their status.

VIEW DEMO

User

User List

Admin can view and manage all the users (end clients) registered on the platform.

VIEW DEMO

Coupons

Manage Coupons

Admin can view, modify all existing discount coupons and add new ones when needed.

VIEW DEMO

History

Payment History

Admin can easily keep a check on all the payments and track the status from the Payments section.

VIEW DEMO

Slider

Manage Slider for Customer App

Admin can set custom images for home page slider in customer app. This is a handy feature for promotional activities.

VIEW DEMO

customize

Powerful Settings

Settings panel covers Personalization, Notifications, Language, Mail, Config, Payment settings and more.

VIEW DEMO

rated 4.7 out of 5

Hear What Customers Say About Handyman

Our customers around the globe have openly shown love for the product and our customer service.
